dt-option.name: firstDay
dt-option.summary: Change which day is first on the calendar.

type.description: This value represents which day should be in the first column of datetime.

dt-option.default: The default value of 0 represents Sunday - the days are 0 indexed starting from Sunday.
dt-option.description: This option allows for the "first" day to be changed to any of the days of the week as desired.
